-e ---

𒂔 ≈ 𒋰𒀹𒑋𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒎗𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒊺𒎕 ≠ 𒋤 ≈ 𒀹𒑋𒀸𐎍𒌋 ≈ 𒊺𒊑 she.ri ≈ ZIR

𒂔 ≈ 𒂍·𒁴·𒍵 ≈ 𒊓·𒁴·𒋗 SA.DIM

𒂔 ≈ 𒁃 BAḪAR₂ 𒁇𒂔 baḫar₃ 𒌋𒂔 baḫar₄ "potter" po'er (British)

𒂔 "Eden" interesting semantic transformation of the same region from Paradise to sierra to desert.

𒂔 ẓir 𒅖 saḫar Sahara™ "desert" 𒋰𒊺𒎕 di.še.zir≈ut

𒂔 ẓir ẓin ⇔ 电 diàn 电儿 diàr

𒂔 ẓin zone "fields" > 田 tián >

𒂔𒈾𒎌 ẓin-na-i insane "wild" @ Sinai 𓃘 asian 𓉻 𓂸 𓃘 𒀲

𒂔 𒊓·𒁴 SA.DIM ˢEDIN

𒂔 EDIN “Eden” plain, desert, steppe, open country(side) → Akkadian: 𒂊𒁲𒉡 (idīnum)

𒂔 EDIN 𒂊𒁷 e-din 𒂊𒁲𒉡 ᵍe-di-nu “Eden” < ᵍeʳ-di-nu Garden 𒂊𒁲𒉡 alone, desert, steppe

𒂔 EDIN 𒍣𒂊𒊒 ṣi-e-ru sierra "(open) fields"

𒂔 𒊐𒅆 EDIN rap-ši •widen-rabuš wide-spread

𒂔𒆤 ghost-desert

𒂔 EDIN 𒂵𒉺𒀊𒌋𒄖𒉡𒌤𒌍𒊺𒆪 ga-pa-ap-U-gu-nu-de-eš-še-ku
𒂔 EDIN 𒆠𒅅𒆠𒅔𒁓𒊒𒌋 ki-ik-ki-in-bur-ru-u

𒂔 ẓir żir zir sûr 𓌨𓂋 „care“
𒂔𒍑 ẓir-us "against"
𒂔 ẓir ⇔ 𒅖 saḫar Sahara
𒂔 ≈ 𒋰𒀹𒑋𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒎗𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒊺𒎕 ⇔ 𒎕 •ẓerb 𒈤 ẓirati

𒂔 EDIN ≈ DIM 𒁴 ≈ 𒋳 šum

𒁴 ≠ 𒀴 ARAD arid

𒂔 ≈ 𒋰𒀹𒑋𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒎗𒎕 ≈ 𒋰𒎗𒁁 ≈ 𒍜 ≈ 𒋰𒎗 ≈ 𒄠
